thread.title: Watch Matt Dillahunty Respond to the Ontological Arguments for God’s Existence
thread.title_full: Watch Matt Dillahunty Respond to the Ontological Arguments for God’s Existence

author: Hemant Mehta
title: Watch Matt Dillahunty Respond to the Ontological Arguments for God’s Existence
text:
March 8, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
In the latest video for his Atheist Debates project, Matt Dillahunty responds to the ideas of ontological arguments (which say that if God is the greatest being ever, and you can conceive of that, He must exist). 
I haven’t had a chance to watch the whole thing yet, but if any moments stand out, please leave the timestamp/summary in the comments! Filed Under: General Leave a Comment Related posts from Friendly Atheist:
